QuestData.Title: Escaping the Tomb
QuestData.Description: I appreciate your help, $n. I was certain I was going to be killed.$B$BLet's get out of here with a hurry. It won't be long before more cultists come after us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Akuno find his way to the Refugee Caravan. Speak to Mekeda after you've completed this quest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mekeda at Refugee Caravan in the Bone Wastes.
QuestData.RewardText: You rescued Akuno, a dear friend of mine. For this I am in your debt, $n.
